m:Panel.headerText: Smart Field with Composite Keys, In/Out and constant parameters

m:Text.text: The Composite keys are declared in the ValueList annotation as InOut value list parameters or Constant value list parameter and are used for filtering. Their usage guarantees that when the description text (from the id-description text pair received because of the TextInEditModeSource=ValueList ) is fetched - all the defined keys in the OData query will be used to have a single result returned.
